attributes.action: Establish a points based selection system (like Australia and New Zealand) to ensure that only people with something of value to offer to the UK economy are allowed to enter our country
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The purpose of this petition is to ask the Government to introduce points based selection systems designed to restrict the flow of immigrants into the UK to only those who meet strict criteria relating to skill, education and health standards.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
